note:
The Citizen Lab is an interdisciplinary laboratory based at the Munk School of Global Affairs & Public Policy, University of Toronto, focusing on research, development, and high-level strategic policy and legal engagement at the intersection of information and communication technologies, human rights, and global security.

We use a “mixed methods” approach to research combining practices from political science, law, computer science, and area studies.

Hi, I'm your friendly Mastodon thread unroller.

Mention @mastoreaderio(@mastodon.social) in a thread and write "unroll". I'll reply with a link.

Use visbility "Mentioned people only" to not spam other people's timelines and threads unless you want others to see the unrolled thread as well.

Direct feedback at @badlogic.

Source: https://github.com/badlogic/ledit/blob/main/site/mastoreaderbot.mjs

Everything runs in your browser! No data is collected! I honor #nobot
